publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3954 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Parents Like Us Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the Parents Like Us Festival that will take place from 8 to 10 May 2009 in Leith; notes that Parents Like Us is Scotland’s biggest festival for parents with children under six; congratulates Parents Like Us on its fifth anniversary; also notes that the programme is full of different activities to suit different age groups and interests; highlights that the festival website and full programme can be found at www.parentslikeus.co.uk, and wishes the volunteers and organisers the best of luck for the festival.
S3M-3954 Parents Like Us Festival (lodged on 22 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-3954 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Parents Like Us Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the Parents Like Us Festival that will take place from 8 to 10 May 2009 in Leith; notes that Parents Like Us is Scotland’s biggest festival for parents with children under six; congratulates Parents Like Us on its fifth anniversary; also notes that the programme is full of different activities to suit different age groups and interests; highlights that the festival website and full programme can be found at www.parentslikeus.co.uk, and wishes the volunteers and organisers the best of luck for the festival. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
S3M-3954 Parents Like Us Festival (lodged on 22 April 2009) Malcolm Chisholm*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-3954 Parents Like Us Festival (lodged on 22 April 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Angela Constance*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Ian McKee*, Jim Tolson*, Bob Doris*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3954 Parents Like Us Festival (lodged on 22 April 2009) Sandra White*, Karen Whitefield*
